descriptionHtml:
[CENTER][FONT=Impact][SIZE=7][COLOR=#548dd4][B]READ PLEASE[/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]

[/CENTER][CENTER][COLOR=#7f7f7f][SIZE=3][FONT=Arial][B]MOD FEATURES:[/B][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/CENTER][CENTER][COLOR=#7f7f7f][SIZE=3][FONT=Arial][B]- a simple hideout that can be used as a House[/B][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/CENTER][CENTER][COLOR=#7f7f7f][SIZE=3][FONT=Arial][B]- a good lighting balance (not too bright neither too dark)[/B][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/CENTER][CENTER][COLOR=#7f7f7f][SIZE=3][FONT=Arial][B]- some furniture (wardrobes, noble bed, firepit , cooking pot, chest)[/B][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/CENTER][CENTER][COLOR=#7f7f7f][SIZE=3][FONT=Arial][B]- a complete smithing set (forge,grindstone and armor workbench)[/B][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/CENTER][CENTER][COLOR=#7f7f7f][SIZE=3][FONT=Arial][B]
[/B][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/CENTER][CENTER][COLOR=#7f7f7f][FONT=Arial][SIZE=2][Changes may occur] [/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR][/CENTER][COLOR=#7f7f7f][FONT=Arial][SIZE=2]
[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR][COLOR=#7f7f7f][FONT=Arial][SIZE=2][I]This is my first mod :) i hope you enjoy it as you please[/I][/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR][COLOR=#7f7f7f][FONT=Arial][SIZE=2][I]i wanted to share my first creation with the community, im very new to creation kit[/I][/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR][COLOR=#7f7f7f][FONT=Arial][SIZE=2][I]so please understand that i cant do everything but i promisse if you find some bug or something[/I][/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR][COLOR=#7f7f7f][FONT=Arial][SIZE=2][I]i will search for the fix and develop the new .esp [/I][/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR][COLOR=#7f7f7f][FONT=Arial][SIZE=2]
[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]


[CHECK THE CHANGELOG ON THE RIGHT]

HOW TO INSTALL:

copy the .esp to your data folder generaly found under

C:Program Files(x86)SteamSteamAppscommonSkyrimData
author: xxbeserkerxx
